trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston

divs: Sighting Detailsme and my family was in the car driving through down a dark road, this was a long strip and there's a cementary on both sides of the roAd! not a residential area, it was a clear night, my father pointed out the light and we pulled over, we stayed in the car, we could see this cigar moving fast through the sky, it circles around really fast, I thought it was An airplane then it came to a stop in mid air as if you paused a movie in the vcr! it wasent a helicopter because the shape and size! it stay in position for a few minutes then is took off at high speed! no sounds were heard! it was silent! this was a long time ago! I was about 11 or 12, im 42 now! I still dont believe in UFO's but since we couldent identify exactly what it was I say it was a UFO! I dont know what people are seeing but its beening seen all over the world AND the govorment should come clean if he do have visitors, if we are on this planet then there has to be others on different planets. VOTE OBAMA 2009!
